name: Sneaksy and the Quest for the Jakkenstone
name_original: Sneaksy and the Quest for the Jakkenstone
description:
Directions
  1. Swipe up or down when the ball (the spell, Storm of Armadyllo) is near you (Sneaksy) to hit the ball up or down.
  2. Swipe left or right to teleport to the left or right side of the arena.
  3. Click near slain enemies to turn them into wights. Be warned, they only last for a short while before they die again!
Story

You're the Skullguy Sneaksy, equipped with the fabled Staff of Armadyllo, searching for the eldar artefact called the Jakkenstone. However, it's protected by the Drakkenson and an army of unwitting heroes! Slay them on your quest to find the Drakkenson and claim the Jakkenstone.
